title: The Claw
description: Meet Piggy, a portly feline, who along with her partner in crime, Melvin, an eccentric, impulsive mouse, manage to get into all the food and mischief they can muster.In volume one of this new, whimsical short story series, Piggy finds herself trapped in her master’s crane machine. Will her miniscule friend devise a plan to save her?The adventures of Piggy in author Karen Malena’s style, will warm your heart and bring a smile to your face, encouraging the camaraderie between friends.
author: Karen Malena
